Reno Aces

The Reno Aces are a Minor League Baseball franchise; the team is a member of the Pacific Coast League and is the Triple-A affiliate of the Arizona Diamondbacks. Owned by SK Baseball, the Aces are a part of the Pacific Conference’s North Division along with the Colorado Springs Sky Sox, Salt Lake Bees, and Tacoma Rainiers. Greater Nevada Field, a 9,100-capacity venue constructed for the team, opened in Spring 2009 in the heart of downtown Reno. The stadium is part of the Freight House District, an exciting year-round entertainment complex that offers unparalleled retail, dining and nightlife options. Click here for their full schedule.
